livingroomapocalypse: I feel every word of this. I need this medicine. I lived in Hollywood, went to makeup school, saw my mom put makeup on every day of her life when I was a girl. yarnpigeon: When I was 2yo the family dog attacked me and bit up half of my face, narrowly missing an eye and the vital bits of my neck. It’s thanks to the beautifully honest and vulnerable humanity that you (and J) and other amazing body positivity warriors share that I haven’t let that crap bother me (almost) at all for the past 3 years. When I look at you I see a beautiful human who I love. And thanks to you, when I look at me... well... I’m getting there...
